title: Bob Saget
description:
Comedian, Actor, and Director Bob Saget sits down with Kevin to talk about coming up in Philly, how he went from America’s dad on the screen in Full House back to his raunchy comedy on the stage, and how he remembers comic legends we’ve lost like Bernie Mac and Robin Williams.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds!
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Bob Saget)
